name: HepatitisA
title: Hepatitis A
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent hepatitis A infections.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to related to Diagnosis. ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with hepatitis A infections. This is a grouping of ICD-10-CM and SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Immunity to hepatitis A by positive serology (finding)
Viral hepatitis A without hepatic coma (disorder)
Hepatic coma due to viral hepatitis A (disorder)
Acute fulminating type A viral hepatitis (disorder)
Viral hepatitis A without hepatic coma, without hepatitis delta (disorder)
